description: This file defines an automation script for a team-based AI system that coordinates search and writing agents to produce a news article. It sets up agents for searching web URLs, writing articles, and an editor team to oversee the process.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent with specific roles and instructions, used for searching and writing tasks.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents working together, such as the editor team overseeing the process.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models, used for the editor's language model.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for performing web searches via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: Newspaper4kTools
classes.description: Tools for extracting and analyzing news articles using newspaper4k.

methods.name: Path.mkdir
methods.description: Creates directories, including parent directories if necessary.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent with specified parameters.

methods.name: OpenAIChat
methods.description: Constructor for creating an OpenAI chat model instance.

methods.name: Team
methods.description: Constructor for creating a team of agents with specified configuration.

methods.name: editor.print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response or instruction from the editor team.
